questions.question: What is Bitcoin and in your view, what are, you know, the principles, the philosophical foundations of Bitcoin?
And what other things are you interested, excited about in terms of the development of Bitcoin?
What are your thoughts about some of the other figures in the space outside of Bitcoin?
What are your thoughts about this kind of approach philosophically or practically to the spread of Bitcoin?
Is there something that really annoys you in terms of the opposite of hard sci-fi?
